name: Worm Odyssey
description:
Uploading the contents of the Worm Odyssey cartridge I found...

                   !!-Important Controls-!!

------------------------------------------------------------
D-pad: ..WASD  = Movement
A: ......Alt   = Stiffen
B: ......Space = Ball form
X: ......E     = Do Trick
Y: ......Shift = Boost (uses mana(uses warm nutrient))
Start: ..Esc   = Go to character select

F5 - Toggles full screen
F4 - Closes the game
F1 - Restarts the game
--------------------------------------------------------------
